translation.en: -I just got your email. -[Liv] I'm fine.
I just have to go out of town for a couple of days.

translation.ko: - 시외로? 무슨 일… - 이메일에 다 적었잖아

translation.en: Everything's in the email I sent. I know it's a lot.
translation.ko: - 시외로? 무슨 일… - 이메일에 다 적었잖아 내용이 많긴 한데 업무가 꼬이면 안 되니까

translation.en: I just don't want any surprises. I'll try to check in when I can.
translation.ko: 내용이 많긴 한데 업무가 꼬이면 안 되니까 기회 되면 연락할게

translation.en: I just don't know what service is gonna be like.
[Ruth] Sure. Should I loop Danny in?
He just came over with the merger.
[Ruth] He's just asking if you still want him on this.
translation.ko: 정말로 이번 일을 자기한테 맡길 건지 물어보더라

translation.en: He's a great lawyer, of course, I do.
-[Ruth] Liv, are you sure you're okay? -I'm fine.
Let's circle back on prep strategy once I'm back in the office.
translation.ko: 준비 전략은 내가 복귀하면 다시 상의하자

translation.en: I've just never known you to take time off--
Ruth, I'm fine. I really have to go. Um,
-text me if you need anything, okay? Bye. -[Ruth] Liv…
[staff] You're the 1:10 trip to Inuvik, right?
Yes. My plane was supposed to leave like an hour ago?
It looks like wind's pretty bad up in Outer Rapids today.
Your plane's stuck there, so, you're kind of SOL, unfortunately.
translation.ko: 항공기가 거기 묶여서 안타깝게도 못 뜬답니다

translation.en: We can try to get you on something tomorrow maybe?
What? No! No, no, no. I-- I took two flights to get here from New York.
translation.ko: 네? 절대 안 돼요 뉴욕에서 경유까지 해서 여기 왔는걸요

translation.en: I have to get to Inuvik today.
I'm… I'm trying to meet someone before they leave again.
translation.ko: 누가 또 사라지기 전에 만나야 해서요

translation.en: -Maybe you can call them? -[Liv] No, I…
translation.ko: - 전화로 연락해 보시죠 - 안 돼요, 전…

translation.en: She… she doesn't know I'm coming.
Can you get me on a plane or not?
translation.ko: 비행기에 태워 줄 수 있긴 해요?

translation.en: I'm sorry, miss, but I can't help you today.
[exhales] You look just like me when I was your age.
translation.ko: 그 나이 때 나를 똑 닮았구나

translation.en: [in Spanish] I'm able to know that.
[George in English] Where are we going this time?
Where are they gonna send us next, the North Pole?
Did you say you're going to Inuvik?
but, is there any way you guys could take me with you?
Crazy for who? You don't even know us.
translation.ko: 미친 소리 맞네요 우린 생판 남이잖아요

translation.en: Look, I'm small, I have this one bag. I promise I'll be quiet.
translation.ko: 전 체구가 작고 가방도 하나예요 조용히 갈게요

translation.en: Quiet's not really an option on a Cessna 208.
I just, I really need to get to Inuvik today.
And it looks like my plane is stuck somewhere and--
-I'm sorry, we'd love to help you out. -[Liv] Then help me out.
You know, but we're doing this for work.
translation.ko: - 제발요 - 개인 여행이면 몰라도 우린 출장 중이거든요

translation.en: Somebody else is picking up the tab and then if something happens,
I think they may be liable for--
I'm a lawyer. That's not a thing.
I'll give you a thousand dollars.
Each. I'll give you each a thousand dollars.
Look, you guys do Venmo? I can-- I can send it to you right now.
translation.ko: 혹시 벤모 쓰시면 바로 송금해 드릴게요

translation.en: Look, I feel for you. We just can't do it.
I just want to sit on your plane.
I just want to sit on your plane
and travel in the direction that you're already flying.
translation.ko: 어차피 가는 방향으로 데려가 달라는 거예요

translation.en: Thank you. We're, we're just figuring out who gets the window seat.
translation.ko: 감사합니다, 그냥… 누가 창가에 앉을지 정하느라요

translation.en: -Sure. We'll get you to Inuvik. -[George sighs]
Oh, my God, thank you. I'm Liv, by the way.
[in loud voice] Just souping her up. Sam likes to go fast.
translation.ko: 출력을 높이려고요 샘이 빠른 걸 좋아해서요

translation.en: [in unamplified voice] I'm a nervous crasher.
-I said no, I'm a nervous crasher. -[chuckles]
Late summer air, mixtures of hot and cold, makes for a rough ride.
translation.ko: 늦여름 대기는 서기와 한기가 뒤섞여서 비행할 때 제법 불안하죠

translation.en: [George] Hey. Hey, no cell phone. You'll mess with the instruments.
translation.ko: 이봐요, 휴대폰 꺼요 장비에 문제 생겨요

translation.en: -Seriously? That's a real thing. -[Sam] Uh, it's fine.
translation.ko: 정말요? - 그거 미신 아니에요? - 신경 쓰지 마요

translation.en: George just doesn't trust anything without a rotary dial.
Isn't there like smoother air higher up or something?
Do you have other thoughts? How's my tracking?
translation.ko: 또 지적할 거 없나요? 내 항적은 어때요?

translation.en: [George] If I didn't, I wouldn't tell you.
You want a Power Bar, bottle of water?
-I'm not really a Power Bar person. -You ever been to Inuvik?
translation.ko: 에너지바는 영 별로라서요 이누빅에 가 보긴 했어요?

translation.en: There's not gonna be much open by the time we land. Take them.
translation.ko: 도착할 때쯤이면 상점은 다 닫았을 거예요 챙겨 둬요

translation.en: So, uh, what… takes you to the northwest territories?
translation.ko: 그나저나 노스웨스트 준주엔 어쩐 일로 가나요?

translation.en: I'm a photographer for National Geographic.
Wow, your job's so much cooler than mine.
Well, I don't know about that. What kind of law do you practice?
translation.ko: 그럴 리가요 당신은 어떤 법을 다루죠?

translation.en: You're right. My job is cooler.
translation.ko: 당신 말대로 내 일이 더 멋지네요

translation.en: Caribou run this late? I thought that was a spring thing.
translation.ko: 카리부가 이렇게 늦게 이주해요? 봄이 철인 줄 알았는데요

translation.en: Hey, you got to go somewhere to come back, right?
translation.ko: 일단 어디라도 가야 돌아올 수 있잖아요

translation.en: I just go where they tell me.
I'll be sitting in a camouflage tent with a thermos full of coffee
translation.ko: 위장 텐트 안에서 커피를 채운 보온병과

translation.en: waiting for anything with antlers to run by.
What brings a securities litigator this far north?
translation.ko: 증권 소송 변호사가 극북 지방엔 어쩐 일이죠?

translation.en: Uh, it seemed like more of an emergency back at the airport.
translation.ko: 그냥 따분한 변호사 일 때문이죠 공항에서 보니 급한 일 같던데요

translation.en: Uh, I'm sorry. I wasn't trying--
No, it's fine. it's just I'm-- I'm tired. Took me forever to get in from…
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 그냥 피곤해서요 여기까지 먼 길을 왔더니

translation.en: We'll try to keep it down for you.
[woman speaks in a calm voice] Close your eyes.
Ensure you're resting in a comfortable position.
in through the nose and out through the mouth.
Focus on tensing and relaxing each part of your body.
translation.ko: 각 신체 부위의 긴장과 이완에 집중하며

translation.en: Allow all thoughts to fall away.
-Hi. -[Liv] Hi. Of course, I made it.
You said you were having a crisis?
Yeah, the crisis was that you never come out to these things.
translation.ko: 네가 이런 자리에 매번 빠지는 문제 말이야

translation.en: -Ruth, I have work to do. -[Ruth] No, Liv, no.
translation.ko: - 루스, 나 바쁘거든? - 리브, 가지 마

translation.en: -No. Come on. -[Ruth] We have all have work to do,
translation.ko: - 루스, 나 바쁘거든? - 리브, 가지 마 우리도 다 바쁘거든? 일단 이거나 받아
우리도 다 바쁘거든? 일단 이거나 받아

translation.en: -[Liv] No. -…your work is beating Danny at darts.
-[stammers] -[Ruth] We're down a player. Yes, yes.
-Go. No, it's fine just go. It's great. -[Liv] Are you fucking…
translation.ko: - 얼른 가, 걱정하지 말고 - 지금 장난해?

translation.en: I think I just got tricked.
Why? You thought it was a shuffleboard tournament?
Am I ready for this? I hear you're a shark.
That's exactly what a shark would say.
Is Ruth trying to set us up?
Although, I guess, technically, we're not at work.
translation.ko: 다만 엄밀히 따지면 여긴 직장이 아니니까

translation.en: Right. Bit of a gray area.
-Why are we flying so low? -[alarm blares]
-Whoa, buddy! We're going down! -There's no pressure and fuel!
[Sam] Help. Help! George. George, help me out.
[gasping, pants] I can't swim. [heavy breathing] I can't swim.
-Sam! Sam, do you have life preservers? -[George groaning]
Flotation devices, something? -No. I don't know. I'll check. -[George grunting]
translation.ko: - 부양 장치 같은 거요 - 글쎄요, 확인해 볼게요

translation.en: Guys, we got to get out of here! I mean, this thing's gonna sink!
Sam, I'm gonna need your help. Sam?
What are you doing? Sam? No!
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거예요? 샘, 안 돼요!

translation.en: -No, just stop, that hurts! -I know it hurts,
-but we've gotta get you out of here. -Okay.
I need you to stop or we'll both drown, okay?
Kick your legs, -I'll take us both in, okay? -Uh-huh.
translation.ko: 다리를 차 봐요 육지까지 데려가 줄게요

translation.en: [Liv in a weak voice] Oh, Sam.
You just have this metal thing in your leg,
-I'm trying to take it out. -No! No, no, no, no, no, I'll bleed out.
translation.ko: - 뽑으려고요 - 안 돼요! 그럼 출혈로 죽어요

translation.en: You have to make a tourniquet.
Okay. It's okay. I got it. I got it.
[Liv] I can't get it tight enough.
Sam, how do I make it tighter?
Okay, I think I got it.
Shit, how do I keep this tight?
I'm just gonna go try and get higher to see if I can get service, okay?
translation.ko: 위쪽에선 신호가 잡히나 보고 올게요, 알았죠?

translation.en: [whispers] It's okay, it's gonna be okay.
One bar. Just one bar. Stupid trees.
translation.ko: 한 칸, 한 칸만 잡혀라 망할 나무들

translation.en: [in a strained voice] Come on, are you fucking kidding me?
Okay. Well, I didn't see you helping.
We'll figure out something better tomorrow.
-Oh, it hurts. -I know, don't try to move. It's your leg.
translation.ko: - 아파 죽겠네! - 네, 움직이지 마요 다리 때문이에요

translation.en: -Make it stop. -Okay. Wait, hold on. Let me see.
translation.ko: - 안 아프게 해 줘요 - 네 잠깐만요, 어디 봐요

translation.en: We're-- we're just gonna have to wait for them to find us.
We're gonna sit tight and we're gonna, we're gonna stay right here--
When you don't show up, your company's gonna send--
-Where-- where are the bags? -Sam, National Geographic's not just…
translation.ko: 내 가방 어디 있어요? 샘, '내셔널 지오그래픽'에서 설마 가만히…

translation.en: When you don't show up, they're gonna send someone. I'm not a photographer.
translation.ko: - 소식이 없으면 누굴 보내겠죠 - 난 사진사가 아니에요

translation.en: No one's coming. No one knows we're here.
translation.ko: 구조대는 안 와요 우리 행방은 아무도 모르죠
